original_text: Esau saw that Jacob had obeyed his father and mother, and that he had gone to Paddan Aram.
korean_text: 또 야곱이 부모의 명을 따라 밧단아람으로 갔으며

sentences.original_text: that Jacob had obeyed his father and mother
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱이 그의 아버지와 어머니에게 순종했다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and that he had gone to Paddan Aram
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 블란 아람으로 갔다는 것을
